CPC Delegation Arrives 
   Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- A delegation of officials of the Communist Party of China led by Li Jengzhen, director of the Party History Research Centre of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and deputy director of the Party School of the Central Committee of the CPC, arrived here today by air.
